body:
Recently a lot of Avicus players are saying there will only be 4 gamemodes in the next update!
NEBULA, NEXUS, SURVIVAL GAMES, WALLS!
Ooh this is gonna be fun!

Also I heard Rumours that the new hub will be having more secret places to hide in and more parkour.
Is there anything that is confirmed that is coming? Anyway I just wanted to tell you about the roomers I heard!
If you think there will be more roomers and confirmed stuff I know, but I wonder if anyone else knows anything more!

THE THING THAT IS BAFFLING ME IS WHY IS THERE A CONTEST FOR AVICADE IF THERE IS NOT AVICADE?

THE THING THAT IS BAFFLING ME IS WHY IS THERE A CONTEST FOR AVICADE IF THERE IS NOT AVICADE?
title: Rumours of the Winter Update Features!
